vendor_name: Jungala Park at VidantaWorld Riviera Maya
title: Playa Del Carmen All-Suite Glamour with Daily Breakfast, Daily US$200 Resort Credit & Waterpark Entry
description:
Immerse yourself in the spectacle of VidantaWorld, an expansive 1000-acre entertainment paradise. Each day offers something new, with attractions all around, from the breathtaking Cirque du Soleil JOYÀ performances to a round of golf on the renowned Nicklaus Design Course.

Linger by the infinity pool, where a morning swim easily flows into poolside cocktails on the chic lounges of The Beach Club. Hop on a complimentary shuttle to nearby palm-lined beaches, or amp up the excitement on a thrilling waterslide at Jungala Aqua Experience.

With exclusive shopping boutiques and a dedicated concierge, every convenience is at your fingertips, while the two luxurious onsite spas promise complete relaxation.
location_description: Jungala Park Hotel at VidantaWorld Riviera Maya
offer_address: Carretera Cancún, Cancún, Riviera Maya 77710, Mexico

title: Award-Winning Mexico Beachfront Luxury on Playa del Carmen with Daily Breakfast & US$100 Dining Credit
description:
Experience the barefoot elegance of Mexico's Playa del Carmen with an enchanting beach resort escape with direct access to one of the Riviera Maya’s longest and most spectacular stretches of beachfront. This Mayan-inspired oasis offers thatched-roof bungalows, bohemian-chic suites nestled among lush jungle gardens, four glittering pools and the acclaimed Revive Spa.

After days soaking up Mexico’s best sun, surf and sand, return to authentic Mayan cuisine at Casita Maya, spicy grapefruit margaritas at Agave Bar and laidback oceanfront plates at Fuego Restaurante y Cantina. Marvel at the Riviera Maya and explore the ancient Mayan ruins of Tulum, a short drive away.
offer_address: Calle 38, Entre Avenida 5a y Zona Federal Maritima, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo 77710, Mexico

vendor_name: Jungala Park at VidantaWorld Riviera Maya

Immerse yourself in the spectacle of VidantaWorld, an expansive 1000-acre entertainment paradise. Each day offers something new, with attractions all around, from the breathtaking Cirque du Soleil JOYÀ performances to a round of golf on the renowned Nicklaus Design Course.

title: Award-Winning Mexico Beachfront Luxury on Playa del Carmen with Daily Breakfast & US$100 Dining Credit
description: Mahekal Beach Resort offers the best of both worlds: a prime location in the heart of Playa del Carmen and direct access to one of the Rivera Maya’s longest and most spectacular stretches of beachfront. Inspired by Mayan tradition and surrounded by lush jungle gardens, it’s easy to see why this resort has racked up acclaim since opening in 2015. After days soaking up Mexico’s best sun, surf and sand, return to authentic Mayan cuisine at Casita Maya, spicy grapefruit margaritas at Agave Bar and laidback oceanfront plates at Fuego Restaurante y Cantina. Heighten the indulgence by upgrading to the Daily Dining or All-Inclusive Upgrade and enjoy the quintessential Mexico resort-style escape.
offer_address: Calle 38, Entre Avenida 5a y Zona Federal Maritima, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo 77710, Mexico

title: Secluded Playa del Carmen Beachfront Sanctuary near Cancun with 10 Restaurants & Bars & Six Pools
description:
Tucked away along Mexico's Riviera Maya, this five-star jungle escape is wrapped in tropical splendour. Fairmont Mayakoba boasts elegant rooms and private casitas scattered along winding lagoons and sugar-sand beaches, surrounded by 595 acres of tropical jungle. Dive into five shimmering pools, unwind at the Mayan-inspired Fairmont Spa or play 18 holes at the prestigious El Camaleón golf course.

Your taste buds are in for a treat with four gourmet restaurants serving everything from Mexican flavours to Korean BBQ. Minutes from Playa del Carmen and surrounded by ancient Mayan wonders, the resort offers endless opportunities for adventure, from snorkelling colourful coral reefs to ziplining through lush jungle canopies.
offer_address: Carretera Federal Cancún Playa del Carmen Km 298, Playa Del Carmen, Quintana Roo, Mexico, 77710

title: Stylish Mexico Coastal Escape in the Heart of Playa del Carmen with Rooftop Pool
description: Pastel colours, quirky art and stylish rooms make up the invigorating KAYAK Sol Playa del Carmen, located in the heart of the city just a five-minute walk from the beach. Dig into a breakfast of indulgent favourites at the coastal casual Marea Restaurant & Bar before wandering down the energetic streets, exploring hidden art galleries and browsing through rows of bustling shops. A 20-minute walk away, you'll stumble upon the vibrant restaurants and thriving nightlife of Quinta Avenida, home to some of the best spots in the city. Closer to the water, experienced divers can investigate the cenotes of the Yucatan Peninsula - an unforgettable opportunity to explore the area's vast underwater tunnels. Less adventurous travellers, however, can keep their feet firmly planted on the ground with a day spent soaking up the sun by the hotel's rooftop pool.
offer_address: Avenida 10, C. 14 Nte, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Q.R., Mexico

title: Mexico Five-Star Award-Winning Oceanfront Escape in Playa del Carmen
description:
Retreat to the five-star haven of Banyan Tree Mayakoba - a hidden sanctuary just moments from the excitement of Mexico's Playa del Carmen. Tucked comfortably between white sands and the famed El Camaleon PGA Championship Golf Course, this idyllic hideaway invites you into a world of lush mangrove forests and pristine coastlines imbued with the charm of the Riviera Maya. The location is flawless, and the resort is perfectly positioned for guests to unearth Playa del Carmen’s wealth of must-see sights, including Mayan ruins and impressive snorkelling spots.

For those looking for an elevated stay, the resort offers a wide range of spa treatments. Treat yourself to massages at Banyan Tree Spa, where Asian and Mexican traditions converge for the ultimate relaxation experience. If fine cuisine is more your cure, gourmands will find no shortage of impeccable dining at any of the resort’s 12 diverse restaurants.
offer_address: Carretera Federal Chetumal-Puerto Juárez KM 298 Riviera Maya, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Q.R., Mexico

title: Playa del Carmen Boutique Resort with Rooftop Bar & Swimming Pool
description: Pull up a seat at the rooftop bar, sip a cocktail and drink in views of the glistening ocean while you take in the sounds of the city - this is everything you can expect staying at the luxury boutique KAYAK Luna Playa del Carmen hotel. Tucked away in the seaside resort town of Playa del Carmen, this sleek hotel is perfectly located for lounging along the Caribbean coast, wandering into sultry speakeasies and hopping between vibrant restaurants.  Spend balmy evenings at the rooftop swimming pool and Eclipse, an all-day restaurant and bar featuring DJ sets and a mouthwatering cocktail menu. When you're not indulging onsite, stroll a short half-block to Calle 12 or head down to Quinta Avenida to enjoy the vibrant nightlife scene.
offer_address: Avenida 10 entre 10 y 12, Playa del Carmen, Q.R., Mexico

title: Boutique Mexico Beachfront Luxury on Playa del Carmen with Mayan-Inspired Spa
description: Experience the barefoot elegance of Mexico's Playa del Carmen at the enchanting Mahekal Beach Resort. This beachfront oasis offers thatched-roof bungalows and bohemian-chic suites nestled among lush jungle gardens, four glittering pools and the Mayan-inspired Revive Spa. Relish traditional Mexican cuisine and sip on cocktails across the hotel's eight restaurants, eateries and bars. Marvel at the Riviera Maya and explore the ancient Mayan ruins of Tulum, a short drive away.
offer_address: Calle 38, Entre Avenida 5a y Zona Federal Maritima, Centro, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo 77710, Mexico

vendor_name: Viceroy Riviera Maya, a Luxury Villa Resort
title: Luxury Mexico Beachfront Resort on the Tropical Riviera Maya
description: Escape to Viceroy Riviera Maya, a Luxury Villa Resort, an exquisite top-rated beachfront retreat that immerses guests in luxury and tranquility on Mexico's verdant Riviera Maya. With a classic combination of lush tropical flora, turquoise waters and pristine powder-white sand, you'll feel like you've stepped into a daydream at this stylish escape - perfect for couples. Take the romance to the next level with alfresco dining and nightlife at the Coral Restaurant + Bar or a wellness treatment at the WAYAK spa.
location_description: Viceroy Riviera Maya, a Luxury Villa Resort
offer_address: Playa Xcalacoco Frac 7, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo 77710, Mexico
